content:
FedEx Developer Portal will experience interruption from 07/13/2024, 9:00 PM CT - 07/14/2024, 2:00 AM CT.
We apologize for any inconvenience such as slow response or technical difficulties. Thank you for your patience!

Menu

Something went wrong...

FedEx is not able to process your request. Please try again.

OKAY
CONTACT SUPPORT
You must be a member of an organization to create projects and use FedEx APIs in transactions. Please have an organization member invite you to join, or if your company is new to the FedEx Developer Portal, create a new organization. A FedEx shipping account number and billing information are required to create an organization.
CREATE AN ORGANIZATION

Are you an existing Web Services or FedEx Ship Manager Server Customer? If so, you can still access the Developer Resource Center.
